column4: Is there a web-based iptables configuration solution similar to what one finds on commercial routers like the WRT54GL?  I want friends to be able to easily add port forwarding without having to figure out iptables.
I'd love, for example, to be able to modify port forwarding in precisely the same way that one can with an off-the-shelf router (going to http://router-address:8000)
oh I see what you mean
